item.description:
Hi friends!

Salvation Cafe in Newport is having it's winter special, where all entrees are half price on Sundays. I really like this place; the food, the music, the ambience and the people are all great!

This would be a perfect place for us to meetup and make some new friends. Hope to see you there!

Paula, thank you for the recommendation!
item.name: Dinner & Drinks!
